subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Therapy and Rehabilitation
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: After injuries sustained in a car accident forced her to step down as the track coach of Stuyvesant High School, Erin O. Taylor turned her focus toward training for the Olympics.
snippet: After injuries sustained in a car accident forced her to step down as the track coach of Stuyvesant High School, Erin O. Taylor turned her focus toward training for the Olympics.
